availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frank Henry Gohmann (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, stove moulder and stove and hollow ware manufacturer)

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, stove moulder and stove and hollow ware manufacturer. Native of Hanover. Married to Mary Ann Schopper Gohmann in Louisville on October 14, 1851. Father of Henry Gohmann, Sophie Gohmann, Mary Gohmann, Lizzie Gohmann, Frank Gohmann, and Annie Gohmann. Stove moulder in Louisville in 1860. Owned F. H. Gohman & Co., stove and hollow ware manufactory in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
